title: Frozen Fruit Smoothies
directions: Put all the ingredients in a blender and process until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
Cooks note: For non-dairy smoothies, substitute 1 cup rice milk for the milk and yogurt. Or, use soy yogurt or milk instead of dairy.
ingredients: 2 cups frozen strawberries, raspberries, or cherries
2 to 3 tablespoons honey or to taste
